docs.abstract: The attorney general’s comments drew criticism that he was conflating objections to police misconduct with a disrespect for the police.
docs.snippet: The attorney general’s comments drew criticism that he was conflating objections to police misconduct with a disrespect for the police.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Attorney General William P. Barr warned that communities and critics of policing must display more deference or risk losing protection, a stark admonition that underscored the Trump administration’s support for law enforcement amid an ongoing national conversation about police brutality against minorities.

headline.main: Barr Says Communities That Protest the Police Risk Losing Protection
headline.print_headline: Barr Issues Warning to Critics of Policing

docs.abstract: Several people have been killed as unrest spreads to new corners of the country. Many see the passage of a new law as anti-Muslim.
docs.snippet: Several people have been killed as unrest spreads to new corners of the country. Many see the passage of a new law as anti-Muslim.
docs.lead_paragraph: NEW DELHI — Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s government has rounded up thousands of Muslims in Kashmir, revoked the area’s autonomy and enforced a citizenship test in northeastern India that left nearly two million people potentially stateless, many of them Muslim.

headline.main: As Protests Rage on Citizenship Bill, Is India Becoming a Hindu Nation?
headline.print_headline: India Erupts in Protests as Modi Presses Vision for Hindu Nation
